TopicTitle: Tracking Station - Planets Unfocused on OpenGL after alt-tab

Articles.Content:
Basically the planets and sun drift off their orbits and there's a broken bit of the screen on the left.

This has been happening since 1.0.4 for me and I don't know if it's a mod or what, here's my gamedata. KOBE is just a planet pack I'm working on, and I have installed patches or updates for any mod here that isn't officially working in 1.0.5:

I had this issue as well.

I have been able to fix this by disabling "Full Screen" under the graphics settings.

Same deal. Was about to post this. However the "Full Screen" tip won't fix it for me. If I try to run the game at 1920X1080 without full screen on it will crash the game.
